alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kimball and south central Banner Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kimball, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kimball and Kimball Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 15 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
